header: wal-mart de mexico proposes dividend payment
body:
MEXICO CITY, March 4 (Reuters) - Leading Mexican retailer Wal-Mart de Mexico said on Wednesday it will propose a 0.61 peso per share dividend at a shareholders meeting on March 12.

The dividend would be paid on April 30, Wal-Mart de Mexico WALMEXV.MX, controlled by Wal-Mart Stores Inc. (WMT.N), said in a statement. (Reporting by Noel Randewich)
